content: 6 cm bind off using italian bind off or any other stretchy bind-off method sleeves slip 80 / 82 / 86 / 90 / 92 sleeve sts on to the 4mm us 6 40 cm circular needles video tutorial https //youtu be/taztzqvupn8 si=rwfxmrfsq9xsyq4i from the center of the underarm co edge pick up 6 / 7 / 8 / 8 / 9 sts pick up 1 extra st to avoid a hole knit sleeve sts pick up 1 extra st to avoid a hole pick up 6 / 7 / 8 / 8 / 9 sts pm on the next round knit each extra stitch together with its adjacent stitch to close the gap you now have 92 / 96 / 102 / 106 / 110 sts sleeve decreases r1 k all repeat r1 a total of 5 times r6 k1 k2tog knit to last 3 sts ssk k1 2 sts decrease repeat row 1-6 17 / 18 / 20 / 21 / 22 more times you now have 56 / 58 / 60 / 62 / 64 sts work the sleeve in the round until it measures 39 / 41 / 43 / 44 / 46 cm from the armhole or until your desired length minus 6 cm for the ribbing ribbing change to 3 5mm us 4 40 cm circular needles note if knitting with a 40 cm circular needle is challenging you can switch to a longer circular e g 100 cm and use the magic loop technique or work with dpns instead r1 k1 p1 * repeat * to eor repeat r1 until ribbing measures approx 6 cm bind off using italian bind off or any other stretchy bind-off method work the second sleeve in the same way finishing weave in all ends this pattern is for personal use only if you have any questions or notice anything that needs correction feel free to email me at alazaknit@gmail com you can share your process and finished photos online please tag them with #foryousweater and @alazaorgu on instagram i hope you enjoy this pattern
